translation.en: [woman] "Do you believe in love at first sight?"
Those were the words that started the whole Emma Gale success story.
translation.ko: 에마 게일 소설의 성공 신화를 시작했던 도입부예요

translation.en: And for 20 years and 12 novels, it seemed like nothing could go wrong.
[assistant] Hello, Ms. Brown. Welcome to The Drew Barrymore Show.
translation.ko: 브라운 작가님 '드루 배리모어 쇼'에 잘 오셨어요

translation.en: Can't I just go home and wait until this blows over?
translation.ko: 그냥 집에 가서 잠잠해질 때까지 기다리면 안 돼?

translation.en: This is not blowing over. This is a Category 5.
Do you know how many people hate you because of this book?
translation.ko: 이번 책 때문에 안티팬이 얼마나 생겼는지 알기나 해?

translation.en: -I thought you were my friend. -Well, right now, I'm your agent.
translation.ko: 우리 친구 아니었어? 에이전트로서 말하는 거야

translation.en: So go out there and charm everybody's pants off.
translation.ko: 그러니 얼른 네 매력으로 시청자들 홀리고 와

translation.en: And try not to look so tall.
translation.ko: 키 큰 거 너무 강조하진 말고

translation.en: I suppose it's possible you might not have read a Sophie Brown novel,
translation.ko: 소피 브라운 소설을 직접 읽진 않았더라도

translation.en: but trust me, you know somebody who has,
translation.ko: 여러분 주변엔 분명 읽은 사람이 있을 겁니다

translation.en: and, boy, do I have some questions for her.
[man] Hm. Join us in welcoming back my good friend and best-selling author, Sophie Brown!
translation.ko: 제 친구이자 베스트셀러 작가인 소피 브라운을 다시 모셨습니다

translation.en: Thank you for having me. I'm surprised I made it in alive.
All of you viewers, if you wonder what we're talking about,
I'd say that Sophie Brown has a whole lot of unhappy fans out there.
translation.ko: 소피 브라운의 많은 팬이 단단히 뿔이 났어요

translation.en: Well, I think you might mean former fans.
Well, I guess we're all wondering about the ending of your latest book.
translation.ko: 최근 출시된 소설의 결말에 대해 다들 궁금해하는데요

translation.en: I know that the character of Winston charmed many of the readers.
translation.ko: 윈스턴의 캐릭터가 많은 독자를 매료시킨 건 알아요

translation.en: Then why in the world would you kill him?
Maybe they just didn't know him like I did.
translation.ko: 윈스턴을 저만큼 잘 알지는 못했나 보죠

translation.en: We don't always get the happy ending.
translation.ko: 인생에 꼭 해피 엔딩만 있는 건 아니잖아요

translation.en: You know, I normally don't do this,
but I have got to agree with the fans out there.
He didn't deserve to fall down the stairs.
translation.ko: 그가 계단에서 떨어져 죽을 만한 이유는 없었잖아요

translation.en: Well, you murdered a man that I was in love with.
I mean, what gives you the right to take him away?
I know, but perhaps you're having a hard time
separating your real life from the fiction in your books.
translation.ko: 소설 속 허구와 구분하지 못하는 건 아닐까요?

translation.en: -What? -[Drew] Well, you've had a rough year.
Your husband left you. You had a very messy divorce.
translation.ko: 남편분이 떠난 데다 이혼 과정도 지저분했고요

translation.en: Okay, but Winston is a fictional character.
And you should be happy that it was a quick death, yeah,
translation.ko: 오히려 빨리 죽었으니 다행이라고 생각해야 할걸요

translation.en: because I could have extended it for ten pages.
translation.ko: 열 장에 걸쳐 천천히 죽일 수도 있었어요

translation.en: I could have dragged him behind a car. I could have poisoned him with mercury.
translation.ko: 차 뒤에 묶어 끌고 다니거나 수은으로 독살할 수도 있었고요

translation.en: I could have chopped him into little, teeny pieces
and fed him to the sharks!
-[TV show theme music playing] -We'll be right back.
I became a writer so I could write in my pajamas,
translation.ko: 잠옷 차림으로 글 쓰려고 작가가 된 건데

translation.en: not so I could get yelled at by strangers.
I thought you became a writer because of Grandpa.
translation.ko: 할아버지 때문에 작가가 된 줄 알았는데요

translation.en: You used to sit in the barbershop and listen to his stories, right?
He had told me that he snuck in once. [chuckles]
He told that one a lot.
Are you sure you're gonna be okay? 'Cause I can come back next weekend.
translation.ko: 정말 괜찮겠어요? 다음 주말에 또 올 수 있는데

translation.en: Absolutely not. You stay at school.
Don't worry about me. I got this.
[Sophie] I need to forget about the Emma Gale fiasco for a while.
translation.ko: 에마 게일 사태에서 잠시 벗어나야 해

translation.en: It's hidden away, and it's quiet, and nobody knows me there.
translation.ko: 숨겨져 있고 조용한 곳이라 아무도 날 못 알아볼 거야

translation.en: Mom, this is great. You're finally taking a vacation.
translation.ko: 엄마, 드디어 휴가를 가다니 너무 잘 생각했어요

translation.en: Just until the bad press dies down.
I can write the new Emma Gale,
translation.ko: 그곳에서 에마 게일 신작을 쓸 생각이야

translation.en: bring Winston back, and everything will be back to normal.
translation.ko: 윈스턴을 다시 살려내면 예전처럼 정상으로 돌아갈 거야

translation.en: All right, well, at least promise me you'll see the castle.
translation.ko: 알았어요, 그래도 그 성에는 꼭 갈 거라고 약속해요

translation.en: [in Scottish accent] Nobody told me that.
[in Scottish accent] Where are you from?
This is all the luggage I have.
-[in Scottish accent] It's not a problem. -Oh. Thank you.
♪ Sometimes we get away with it ♪ ♪ Sometimes we get burned… ♪
♪ Sometimes we can just learn from it ♪
translation.ko: "편안한 침대, 조식 제공 현지인의 서비스" "훌륭한 음식과 따뜻한 환대"

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you were… here.
[Sophie] Hey. Are you the welcoming committee?
Oh, hi. May I help you?
In our wee village? Dinna be daft.
translation.ko: 이 촌구석에? 말도 안 되는 소리

translation.en: I have a reservation under Sophie Brown.
Not sure I should admit it, but, uh, yes. [chuckles]
I've read all your books. [chuckles] I just finished the last one.
translation.ko: 작가님 책을 다 읽었어요 마지막 책은 최근에 끝냈고요

translation.en: -May I ask you a question, then? -Sure.
Why'd you leave it so long to kill off Winston?
translation.ko: 왜 인제 와서야 윈스턴을 죽인 거예요?

translation.en: -What? -I was hoping you'd do it in volume one.
I never liked that sod. Too bloody perfect.
translation.ko: 그 인간 좀 별로였거든요 재수 없게 완벽해 가지곤

translation.en: You know what? I'm not so sure I did either.
translation.ko: 저도 별로 좋아하진 않았던 것 같네요

translation.en: -[chuckles] I killed him off. -Good for you, Sophie Brown. [laughs]
[Sophie] Sod. Got any other names for him?
translation.ko: 망할 놈 말고 다른 이름은 없을까요?

translation.en: That's very kind. I'm sure it's not what you're used to.
translation.ko: 친절도 하셔라, 이런 곳에 익숙하실지 모르겠어요

translation.en: …it is exactly what I was hoping for.
[woman] Aye, it's just over the hill.
Well, if you need anything else, Ms. Brown, just ring.
translation.ko: 브라운 씨, 필요하신 게 있으면 언제든 전화 주세요

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Maisie. You too.
[agent] Scotland? Really? Why didn't you clear this with me first?
translation.ko: 스코틀랜드? 진심이야? 왜 미리 나한테 얘기 안 했어?

translation.en: Because you would have talked me out of it.
-How long have we known each other? -Too long.
translation.ko: - 우리 알고 지낸 게 몇 년이지? - 너무 오래됐지

translation.en: Since page one, book four. And when have I ever steered you wrong?
translation.ko: 네 번째 책 처음 쓸 때부터잖아 내가 언제 잘못된 조언을 했다고?

translation.en: -The title of book six. -Oh, aside from that!
translation.ko: - 여섯 번째 책 제목은? - 그거 빼고!

translation.en: Don't worry. I'm here to write.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마, 글 쓰러 온 거니까

translation.en: Good, and when can I expect to see pages?
translation.ko: 알았어, 첫 부분은 언제쯤 볼 수 있는 건데?
오래 안 걸려, 거의 저절로 쓰이는 수준이야

translation.en: Right, now, the gift shop is right here.
Uh, no, you've missed the… the gift shop.
No? Well, surely you don't wanna leave without a souvenir.
translation.ko: 정말 안 보세요? 기념품 하나쯤은 가져가셔야죠

translation.en: Kilts, tea towels, coasters? All with the clan coat of arms, of course.
translation.ko: 킬트나 티 타월, 컵 받침은요? 가문 문장도 찍혀 있어요

translation.en: Well, may your travels be swift.
[guide] Aye, well, perhaps one of them could be fixing the door to the library.
translation.ko: 서재 문 고치는 거나 고민하지 그래?

translation.en: -It's hard to get the people in. -Aye, it's even harder to get them out.
translation.ko: - 사람들이 들어가기 어려워해 - 들여보내면 안 나오잖아

translation.en: -So you work here too? -Wherever they'll have me.
You just missed the tour, but the next one's Thursday.
translation.ko: 투어는 방금 끝났는데요 다음 건 목요일이고요

translation.en: Oh, well, um, could I just wander around a little on my own?
It's all right, Thomas. I'll give her a tour.
-I wouldn't want to get you in trouble. -Take my chances.
translation.ko: - 곤란하게 하고 싶진 않아요 - 운에 맡겨 보죠

translation.en: [man] There are more than 3,000 castles in Scotland.
Some date back to the 14th century.
These grand old ladies hold the proud history
of all those who lived, worked, and fought here.
translation.ko: 여기서 살고, 일하고, 전쟁도 겪었던 자들의 역사가 담겨 있죠

translation.en: This here is the music room
where the third duchess wrote a book of poems.
-Have you read it? -Aye, and I wouldn't recommend it.
-So you're here for the day, then? -A little longer.
translation.ko: - 오늘 하루만 묵으시나요? - 좀 더 있으려고요

translation.en: Aye. Tourists don't usually stay in our village.
translation.ko: 우리 마을에 오래 있는 관광객은 많지 않아서요

translation.en: We're more of what you call a drive-through.
Dun Dunbar was built by the first Duke of Dunbar for his wife.
translation.ko: 이 성은 던바 1대 공작이 부인을 위해 지었어요

translation.en: Been in the same family for 500 years.
translation.ko: 그 이후로 던바 가문이 500년 동안 소유했죠

translation.en: -Who owns it now? -Just some royal arse.
translation.ko: - 지금의 주인은 누구예요? - 콧대 높은 왕족이겠죠, 뭐

translation.en: -[dog collar clinking] -Hamish! Hamish. -[Sophie] Oh my goodness. Oh! -[Hamish whimpers]
Never seen him like this. Have you meat in your pocket?
translation.ko: 이러는 건 처음 봐요 주머니에 고기 있어요?

translation.en: I always carry a steak on my person. [laughs]
Out now. Go on. Get out. Go on!
So, this is the older part of the castle.
translation.ko: 여기는 성의 다른 곳보다 일찍 지어진 부분이에요

translation.en: The Dunbars had meetings of the clan and grand celebrations in here.
translation.ko: 던바 가족은 여기서 가문 회의와 성대한 축하 파티를 열었어요

translation.en: Apparently, the best way to defend by a right-handed swordsman.
I guess the, uh, royal arse needs a lot of thrones.
-Can we go up? -Sorry, not part of the tour.
Can I steal you away from the tour for a moment?
translation.ko: 투어 중에 미안한데 잠깐 얘기 좀 할까?

translation.en: There's a couple wanting to talk about a wedding. All right. How do they look?
translation.ko: - 결혼식 대관 문의가 있어서 - 보기에 어때?

translation.en: At the top of the stairs, there are three doors.
translation.ko: 계단을 올라가면 문이 세 개 나온다고 했지

translation.en: I just needed to see something.
And what could you possibly need to see up here?
Okay, the thing is, I have a little family history in this place.
translation.ko: 실은 우리 가족 역사가 이 성과 관련이 있어요

translation.en: Don't tell me. You did a DNA test, and your ancestor's Mary Queen of Scots?
translation.ko: DNA 검사를 해 보니 조상이 스코틀랜드 여왕이던가요?

translation.en: Do you know why no one's allowed up here?
I'm guessing frostbite. Because it's someone's home.
translation.ko: - 동상 걸릴까 봐서? - 누군가의 집이기 때문이죠

translation.en: How would you like a parade of gawkers traipsing through yours?
translation.ko: 당신 집에 사람들이 쳐들어와 이것저것 들쑤시면 좋겠어요?

translation.en: Well, consider it a tip for your warmth and hospitality.
translation.ko: 워낙 따뜻하게 맞아 주셔서 드리는 팁이라고 생각하세요

translation.en: Well, here's a tip for you.
Stay out of places you don't belong.
translation.ko: 가면 안 되는 곳에는 가지 마세요

translation.en: -[woman 1] I would love to see you dance. -[woman 2] Well, those were the days.
translation.ko: - 춤추는 모습 보고 싶네요 - 좋은 시절이었지

translation.en: -[woman 1] Go on, then. Give us a show. -[woman 2 laughs]
-[Maisie] Oh, I'd like to see that. -Hi.
-Enjoy the castle? -I did, yes. It was magical.
translation.ko: - 성은 잘 구경하셨어요? - 네, 동화처럼 아름다웠어요

translation.en: -I rather love them too. -We've read every one.
translation.ko: - 저도 소설 너무 좋아해요 - 전부 읽었어요

translation.en: -I told them not to bother you. -[Sophie] Are you kidding?
You may be the only readers left who don't hate me.
translation.ko: 절 미워하지 않는 독자는 여러분밖에 안 남은걸요

translation.en: Oh, no. I mean, I've always wanted to learn, but…
Oh! Well, these might come in handy.
Then you can join our club.
translation.ko: 이제 우리 모임에 가입할 수 있어요

translation.en: I'm a pastry chef, but for now, I make biscuits in the bakery across the way.
translation.ko: 제빵사인데, 지금은 맞은편 빵집에서 비스킷을 만들어요

translation.en: His husband was one of the original members, but he passed on.
Not long after, Angus showed up. Hasn't stopped knitting since.
translation.ko: 얼마 안 돼서 앵거스가 나오더니 뜨개질을 놓질 않아요

translation.en: Here, would you like me to show you how to knit?
translation.ko: 자, 뜨개질 어떻게 하는지 보여 줄까요?

translation.en: -Oh, it's hard when they move away. -It's harder when they move back in.
translation.ko: - 애가 독립하면 힘들죠 - 다시 돌아오면 더 힘들고요

translation.en: Uh, it's been a year since my divorce.
I've got a boyfriend in the bakery.
-He just doesn't know it yet! -I'm still married.
translation.ko: - 상대는 모르고 있지만요 - 난 아직 이혼 안 했는데

translation.en: Although, I'm not sure he knows it either.
-[Sophie laughs] -Not true. You two are madly in love. We are.
It's nice to hear him laugh like that. He hasn't spoken a word since Graham died.
translation.ko: 웃음소리 들으니 좋네요 사별한 이후로 한마디를 안 했었는데

translation.en: you chose our little village to write the next Emma Gale!
translation.ko: 에마 게일 후속편을 쓰러 이 작은 마을에 오시다니!

translation.en: Well, I was supposed to come here a long time ago with my dad.
translation.ko: 사실 오래전에 아버지와 같이 오기로 했었어요

translation.en: But he got sick, and we never made it.
translation.ko: 하지만 몸이 안 좋아지셨고 결국 못 오시게 됐네요

translation.en: He lived at Dunbar Castle as a kid.
translation.ko: 아버지가 어렸을 때 던바 성에 사셨거든요

translation.en: Well, outside the castle. They weren't allowed inside.
translation.ko: 엄밀히는 성 밖이지만요 안에는 못 들어갔대요

translation.en: -His family, they were the groundskeepers. -You mean your family?
translation.ko: - 아버지 가족이 관리인이었거든요 - 작가님 가족 말이죠?

translation.en: Ah, you're one of us, then. [chuckles]
McGuinty. I… I don't think I've heard that name around here.
translation.ko: 맥귄티라, 여기서 그런 이름은 못 들어 봤는데

translation.en: Well, they moved to New York when he was a boy.
translation.ko: 아버지가 어렸을 때 다 뉴욕으로 이주했거든요

translation.en: I was at school with a McGuinty back in the day.
translation.ko: 예전에 학교 다닐 때 맥귄티라고 있었어요

translation.en: Always blethering and telling the tales.
translation.ko: 항상 허풍 떨면서 온갖 얘기를 하길 좋아했어요

translation.en: Of course, we called him something else.
[sobs] Oh, I don't know why I'm crying.
Because these are your roots, dear.
I wish I'd come back sooner.
And you got to see Dun Dunbar while it's still a castle.
translation.ko: 아직 성일 때 던던바도 볼 수 있고요

translation.en: -What do you mean? -It's… it's up for sale.
A lot of the old castles are for sale.
Aberdeenshire's cheaper than a Range Rover.
translation.ko: 애버딘셔 부동산 가격이 레인지 로버보다 싸잖아요

translation.en: And you'd be more comfortable living in a Range Rover.
translation.ko: 레인지 로버에 사는 게 더 편하기도 하고요

translation.en: [man] So someone wants a trophy castle?
translation.ko: 누가 과시할 목적으로 성을 산다고 하던가요?

translation.en: It's worse, then. They wanna tear it down for condos and a golf course.
translation.ko: 그럼 다 밀어 버리고 콘도와 골프장이라도 짓는대요?

translation.en: I'm doing the tours and the gift shop.
translation.ko: 방문객 투어도 하고 기념품 가게도 운영하고 있어요

translation.en: I've agreed to the weddings and… and maybe even a funeral or two.
translation.ko: 결혼식 대관도 하고 장례식도 몇 건 할지 몰라요

translation.en: Look, we've been mates for a long time.
translation.ko: 우리가 알고 지낸 게 몇 년인가?

translation.en: I've bent over backwards, keeping you out of foreclosure.
translation.ko: 어떻게든 가압류는 막아 주려고 나도 백방으로 노력했어

translation.en: I just need a little more time, Ian.
There is no more time unless you sell off the farmlands.
translation.ko: 농지를 팔지 않으면 더는 시간을 못 줘

translation.en: -Sophie Brown. Myles Dunbar. -You're the royal arse?
translation.ko: - 소피 브라운, 마일스 던바에요 - 콧대 높은 왕족이 당신?

translation.en: -You're the buyer? -He let me think he worked here.
And you can't just show up and decide to buy a castle, like some hamburger.
translation.ko: 햄버거 사듯 성을 사다니 이런 법이 어디 있죠?

translation.en: -Well, you did say it was a drive-through. -I'm not selling to her.
Uh, Myles is the 12th Duke of Dunbar.
Oh, well, forgive me, Your Highness.
I can think of a few other names I'd call you.
And you wouldn't be the first.
the title does not come with the land.
So if that's what you're after, you can buy a ladyship online for £30.
translation.ko: 귀부인 타이틀을 원하는 거면 30파운드 주고 인터넷에서 사요

translation.en: The only title I'm interested in is my next book,
translation.ko: 제가 관심 있는 유일한 타이틀은 다음 소설의 제목뿐이에요

translation.en: which I'm going to write at Dun Dunbar in the library.
I'm not giving up 500 years of history on someone's whim.
translation.ko: 충동구매에 장단 맞추자고 500년 역사를 포기할 순 없어요

translation.en: -It is not a whim. -Oh my. What is it, then?
Do you believe in love at first sight? No, I don't.
But if I did, that would be what I felt when I saw Dun Dunbar.
translation.ko: 하지만 믿었다면 이 성을 보고 첫눈에 사랑을 느꼈을 거예요

translation.en: On the grounds. A long time ago.

translation.ko: - 당신 가족을 위해 일하셨죠 - 믿어 달라는 건가요?

translation.en: I thought that dukes were supposed to be gentlemen.
You realize you just handed over Dun Dunbar to the bank?
translation.ko: 제안을 거절했으니 던던바는 은행으로 넘어가게 됐어, 알지?

translation.en: to obliterate the memory of the most awful, arrogant person you've ever met?
translation.ko: 끔찍하고 거만한 사람을 만난 기억을 지우고 싶거든요

translation.en: He's lived here his whole life.
I've had a change of heart. Oh, so you actually have one.
translation.ko: - 마음이 바뀌었어요 - 심장이 있긴 한가 보네요

translation.en: If I agree to this, there are conditions.
I am not living with you.
Look, this has nothing to do with you and me.
There is no you and me.
Exactly. If I'm gonna sell the old girl, I need to know you can take care of her.
translation.ko: 성을 팔기 전에 당신이 관리할 능력이 있는지 봐야죠

translation.en: And you need to know how hard that is.
translation.ko: 얼마나 힘든 건지 직접 느껴 봐요

translation.en: Dun Dunbar is a living, breathing thing.
or she'll crumble like an oatcake in the rain.
translation.ko: 비 맞은 과자처럼 힘없이 무너질 거예요

translation.en: Two quid. I'll throw it into the deal.
She'll realize the mistake she made and be gone in a week.
translation.ko: 일주일 안에 실수를 깨닫고 사라질 거야

translation.en: Meanwhile, her deposit will get us through spring,
translation.ko: 일단 봄까지는 소피의 보증금으로 버텨 보고

translation.en: and I'll figure out something after that.
-And if she doesn't leave? -Oh, she'll leave.
translation.ko: - 만약 떠나지 않으면? - 분명 떠나게 돼 있어

translation.en: I'll make her life so miserable she'll never want to see a castle again.
translation.ko: 다시는 살면서 성 근처에도 가기 싫어지게 괴롭혀 주지

translation.en: Aye. Well, you do have a knack of driving people away.
translation.ko: 맞아, 네가 사람들 쫓아내는 데는 소질이 있으니까

translation.en: Aye, but you pay me. Barely. Besides, who else would put up with you?
translation.ko: 쥐꼬리라도 월급은 주잖아 또, 나 아니면 누가 널 견뎌?

translation.en: "Slainte" is what we say in Scotland.
Wait, wait. I thought you said you were buying a castle. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 잠시만, 성을 산다니 내가 제대로 들은 게 맞아요?

translation.en: I did. Mom, are you drunk?
Oh! Not anymore. I'm buying Dun Dunbar.
Oh, I… I can't explain it.
Um, except for the fact that I think he would want me to.
I can almost picture his face when I walk through that door with the key.
translation.ko: 열쇠를 들고 성문을 통과하면 아버지 얼굴이 보일 것만 같아

translation.en: I haven't seen you smile like this in a really long time.
translation.ko: 엄마가 이렇게 웃는 모습 오랜만에 봐요

translation.en: [chuckles] I know. It's like it was meant to be.
Although I have to live with him till Christmas.
translation.ko: 성탄절까지 그 남자와 살아야 하긴 하지만

translation.en: Here. The key to my castle.
Now you get the real tour.
you should know, here on the estate, we have a community-owned wind farm
translation.ko: 이 땅에는 마을 공동 소유의 풍력 발전소가 있어요

translation.en: where we create 70% of our energy.
We also have sustainable forestry and organic farming.
translation.ko: 지속 가능한 산림과 유기농 농업도 추구하고요

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Four years at Oxford, two years Cambridge.
And this here is Flemish, 16th century.
I will have no reason to go in there. We agree on that.
More rooms. No power, leaky roof.
translation.ko: 전기도 없고 지붕은 삐걱거리는 방이 더 있고요

translation.en: The fifth duke died in here, in that very bed.
[Myles] There's a reason they set horror movies in castles.
translation.ko: 공포 영화를 성에서 찍는 이유가 있어요

translation.en: It leaks after every rain, and it rains 150 days a year.
translation.ko: 비가 오면 물이 새는데 일 년에 반은 비가 오죠
배관은 막히기 일쑤고 60개 벽난로는 보수 중인 데다

translation.en: Oh, by the way, we don't heat the upstairs.
So, you'll stay in this one.
[scoffs] Are you sure the duke didn't die in this room,
and he's still in here somewhere?
-Why? -[clears throat] Is this room not up to your standards?
translation.ko: 왜요? 이런 방에서 살기엔 너무 고귀하신가?

translation.en: Is there a closet? There's a chair.
Oh, by the way, I looked up your family. There's no Brown in the records.
translation.ko: 그나저나 기록을 찾아봤는데 브라운이란 이름은 없어요

translation.en: -That's my married name. -Oh, you're married, then?
Aye, now that I can believe.
McGuinty. He got caught before he could finish.
Didn't think there was anything here I hadn't seen. When was this?
translation.ko: 이 성에 내가 못 본 것도 있었네 언제 얘기죠?

translation.en: Sixty years ago. He was a kid.
He snuck in and made it upstairs.
He just wanted someone to know he got inside.
translation.ko: 성안으로 들어온 걸 기록하고 싶으셨던 거죠

translation.en: But some heartless stuffed shirt tossed him out and fired his father.
translation.ko: 꽉 막힌 귀족이 아버지를 쫓아내고 할아버지를 해고했대요
나도 공감 못 하는 건 아녜요

translation.en: My old man wasn't much better.
McGuinty, it's a strong name. You should stick with that.
translation.ko: 맥귄티라, 기억에 남는 이름인데 그 이름을 쓰세요

translation.en: -Should we go get a cup of tea? -[barks, groans]
All I want is a cup of tea. Is that too much to ask?
translation.ko: 차 한잔하고 싶을 뿐인데 이렇게까지 어려울 일이야?

translation.en: I thought that… that this was the kitchen.
As long as you're here, do you mind pouring me another?
translation.ko: 기왕 오신 김에 한 잔 더 따라 주시죠?

translation.en: -You could've locked the door. -Why? It's my house.
[Sophie] Be happy that it was a quick death. I could have extended it for ten pages.
translation.ko: 오히려 빨리 죽었으니 다행이지 열 장에 걸쳐 죽일 수도 있었어요

translation.en: I could have dragged him behind a car. I could have poisoned him with mercury.
translation.ko: 차 뒤에 묶어 끌고 다니거나 수은으로 독살할 수도 있었고요

translation.en: I could have chopped him into little, teeny pieces
and fed him to the sharks!
Page one. "Do you believe in love at first sight? I didn't used to."
Now, where have I heard that before? Oh, right. Your sales pitch.
translation.ko: 이 멘트 어디서 들었더라? 아, 성 사려고 날 설득할 때지

translation.en: "The first time I laid eyes on Winston,
-Are you gonna read the whole thing to me? -No, page one's good enough for me.
translation.ko: - 전부 소리 내서 읽게요? - 아뇨, 첫 장에 답 나오네요

translation.en: If you are trying to discourage me,
a cold room and a couple of bats in the attic are not gonna do it.
translation.ko: 박쥐 나오는 추운 방으론 어림도 없어요

translation.en: "'I will not be discouraged,' said Emma. 'I will get what I came for.'"
translation.ko: '난 포기하지 않을 거야 목적을 이루겠어', 에마가 말했다

translation.en: Yeah, this is Pulitzer Prize stuff, this.
Well, you remember what happened when it was purple, don't you?
translation.ko: 보라색으로 염색했을 때 어땠는지 기억 안 나?
- 뭐 하고 있어요? - 뜨개질로 그라피티 해요

translation.en: Yarn bombing. It's a thing. Perks up the neighborhood.
-How was your first night at the castle? -Cold.
Well, you're just in time to stop this massacre.
Rhona wants to chop it off and dye it green.
translation.ko: 로나가 글쎄 짧게 자르고 초록색으로 염색한대요

translation.en: Ooh. I really hope we're talking about hair.
I grew up over a barbershop owned by the best scissor man in Queens,
and an expert colorist. Let's do it.
translation.ko: 이발사가 또 염색 장인이었죠 저한테 맡겨 봐요

translation.en: -[Rhona] So, I think a bit of color. -[Sophie] Okay, all right.
Hi. Yeah, I'm gonna need your help.
-[Helen] Does she know we're coming? -[Maisie] I just texted her.
translation.ko: - 우리가 오는 걸 아나요? - 방금 문자 보냈어요

translation.en: [Helen] That will be lovely up there in that room.
[Maisie] Ah, yeah, we're right behind you, Speedy Gonzales. I see you running off.
translation.ko: 따라가고 있잖아, 토끼 씨 그냥 가버리네

translation.en: [Helen] Dinna hang back. Knitters to the rescue.
-I've never been up the stairs before. -Well, it's clear you haven't missed much.
translation.ko: - 위층엔 처음 와 보네 - 그렇게 대단한 건 없었네요

translation.en: -Not as perfect as my hair. -I have to admit, it does suit you.
translation.ko: - 제 머리만큼 완벽할까요? - 그건 정말 인정이야

translation.en: Well, this is looking rather nice.
Where's the Scotch dresser? And the lamps?

translation.ko: - 뭐야, 두 분 무슨 사이죠? - 아무 사이 아녜요

translation.en: Oh, that's been going on forever.
Maybe we dated for a bit before I married Sean.
translation.ko: 션과 결혼하기 전에 잠깐 만났던 사이예요

translation.en: Well, you're not married now, are you?
Oh, I don't know how to thank you.
Not necessary. We knitters look after each other.
translation.ko: 고마워할 필요 없어요 뜨개질 모임은 항상 서로 챙겨줘요

translation.en: No one crosses the knitters. Right, Angus?
translation.ko: 아무도 우리한테 반항 못 해요 맞죠, 앵거스?

translation.en: You know, I've known Myles my whole life.
After you get past that upper crust, he's got a good heart.
translation.ko: 차가워 보이는 겉면 아래에는 따뜻한 마음이 있어요

translation.en: -[scoffs] -It might be hard to see right now.
You couldn't find a better landlord. That's for certain.
translation.ko: 마일스처럼 좋은 임대주가 없는 건 확실하죠

translation.en: My family has been tenants on the Dunbar land for generations.
translation.ko: 우리 가문은 몇 세대 동안 던바 땅에 세를 들어 살았어요

translation.en: The 11th duke squandered what remained of the family money,
translation.ko: 11대 공작이 남은 가족 유산을 흥청망청 써 버렸고

translation.en: left Myles with an empty title,
a mountain of debt, and the whole village counting on him.
translation.ko: 산더미 같은 빚과 그만 애타게 바라보는 주민들만 남았죠

translation.en: It's the reason he's selling the castle.
So he can pay off the debt on the farmlands.
we'll all have a place to live. Hm.
Come after finals. We can have Christmas here.
translation.ko: 기말고사 끝나고 놀러 와 여기서 성탄절 보내자

translation.en: I… I told him I'd go, but I really don't have to.
translation.ko: 아빠한텐 가겠다고 했는데 정말 안 가도 돼요

translation.en: Oh, uh, nice to meet you. You too.
The damp air degrades the books.
The knitters told me some things.
translation.ko: 뜨개질 모임 분들한테 들은 게 있는데

translation.en: I think maybe my first impression of you was wrong.
I doubt it. So, who's what's-her-name?
-So you were listening? -I may have heard a word or two.
[exhales] The woman for whom my husband left me.
That actually sounded like a compliment.
It's more of an insult to him.
If I'm being honest, it wasn't all his fault.
I've spent most of the last decade on my computer.
[exhales] I was married once. A long time ago.
She left me for someone with a bigger title.
translation.ko: 더 높은 작위를 가진 남자한테 가더군요

translation.en: When she left me, I came back here to put myself back together.
Dun Dunbar's been my life ever since.
translation.ko: 그때부터 던던바는 내 인생의 전부가 됐어요

translation.en: Oh, what am I saying? I sound like a character from one of your books.
translation.ko: 내가 무슨 소릴 하는 거지? 당신 소설 주인공처럼 말하네요

translation.en: -So you're reading my books? -Point is, people leave, we survive.
translation.ko: - 제 소설을 읽나 보네요? - 어쨌든 이별해도 안 죽어요

translation.en: I guess I just never thought I'd be alone at this stage of my life.
translation.ko: 이 나이가 돼서 혼자 남을 줄은 몰랐어요
- 어딜 가요? - 책 쓰는 것도 아니잖아요

translation.en: Oh, look at the hairy coos.
You might know them as expensive sweaters.
translation.ko: 고급 스웨터 재료로 알고 있을 것 같지만

translation.en: [Sophie] Really? You mean like the one you're wearing?
translation.ko: 양털 스웨터 입으신 분이 할 소리는 아닌 것 같은데요

translation.en: -[Myles] Ocean view from every room. -Central air conditioning.
translation.ko: - 모든 방에서 바다가 보이죠 - 냉난방도 끝내주겠어요

translation.en: And it comes with its own graveyard.
Exactly. You never have to leave.
[Myles] There's one more place I'd like to show you.
So, this is Dun Glen Holy Well.
Legend dates back to the first Duchess of Dunbar.
When war broke out, she donned the garments of a warrior,
translation.ko: 전쟁이 발발하자 공작부인은 전사의 갑옷을 입고

translation.en: came to this very well, and laid a necklace on the edge for courage.
translation.ko: 용기를 북돋으려고 우물가에 목걸이를 두고 갔대요

translation.en: Well, she went off to fight.
Turned out she had the heart of a warrior.
She ended up saving the village and falling in love with a man who fought by her side.
translation.ko: 마을을 구한 뒤, 같이 싸웠던 한 남자와 사랑에 빠졌어요

translation.en: Aye. If you like that sort of tale.
Wed on Christmas Eve at Dun Dunbar.
And every Christmas Eve after that, for a century or two anyway.
translation.ko: 그 후 한두 세기 동안은 매년 파티를 열었고요

translation.en: Christmas Eve at Dun Dunbar for the village.
Okay… [exhales] …that's the end of the tour.
How about we end it at the pub?
I dinna really hang out there all that much.
translation.ko: 전 술집에 그렇게 자주 안 가요

translation.en: -Oh, come on. -No, no, no, I don't wanna.
-What's the matter with you, man? -No, I cannot sing.
translation.ko: - 왜 그래? - 나 노래 못 해

translation.en: Course you can sing. Anyone can sing. Here we go. Come on.
translation.ko: 그게 무슨 말이야 누구나 노래는 하지, 자, 어서

translation.en: ♪ By yon bonnie banks And by yon bonnie braes ♪
translation.ko: 아름다운 호수 둑과 들판이 펼쳐진 곳

translation.en: ♪ Where the sun shines bright On Loch Lomond ♪
♪ Where me and my true love Will never meet again ♪
translation.ko: 나와 내 진정한 사랑이 다시는 만날 수 없는 곳

translation.en: ♪ On the bonnie, bonnie banks Of Loch Lomond ♪
♪ You'll take the high road And I'll take the low road ♪
translation.ko: 당신은 높은 길을 따라 나는 낮은 길을 따라 가네

translation.en: ♪ And I'll be in Scotland afore ye ♪
♪ Where me and my true love Will never meet again ♪
translation.ko: 나와 내 진정한 사랑이 다시는 만날 수 없는 곳

translation.en: ♪ On the bonnie, bonnie banks Of Loch Lomond… ♪
it's… it's not like this was a date or anything, right?
[Thomas] Well, it's been a month now,
It appears you're warming up to her.
-Am I starting to look like them? -No comment.
translation.ko: - 나도 이들을 닮아가고 있나? - 노코멘트 할게

translation.en: No. Look, you've spent your whole life trying not to be them.
translation.ko: 넌 평생 이들처럼 안 되려고 애써 왔잖아

translation.en: You've been alone a long time in this castle.
And here the two of us are,
standing around looking at old paintings of people we hated.
translation.ko: 싫어하는 사람들의 옛 초상화나 보고 있네

translation.en: [Sophie] What the heck was the well saying?
[Sophie] "The well whispered a story to her longing heart."
I don't have an exact plan.
You can't just run off to Scotland and hide out in a castle.
translation.ko: 스코틀랜드로 도망가서 성에 숨어 버리면 어떡해

translation.en: I'm not going to tell you that your life depends on writing this book.
translation.ko: 네 인생이 다음 책에 달려 있다고는 말 안 할게

translation.en: And I know you, Sophie. You have worked your whole life for this.
translation.ko: 난 널 잘 알잖아, 소피 평생을 이것만 보고 달려왔어

translation.en: And this is where the third duchess would retire… Ay, oh.
Oh my God, that's Sophie Brown!
[Thomas] Everybody, if we could, um, just move on.
I've read all your books. Could I have a selfie?
translation.ko: 작가님 소설 전부 읽었어요 사진 찍어 주실래요?

translation.en: Right. All right, then. No, let's continue on. That's very good.
translation.ko: 자, 이제 됐어요 이제 투어를 계속하죠

translation.en: You know what, Thomas? I have an idea. Why don't I give the tour?
translation.ko: 이건 어때요, 토머스? 제가 구경시켜 드리는 거죠

translation.en: William Wallace, the very mason who built Edinburgh Castle,
translation.ko: 에든버러 성을 지었던 석공인 윌리엄 월러스가

translation.en: put these in himself, and they are filled with legends.
translation.ko: 이걸 직접 조각했어요 여러 전설로 가득하죠

translation.en: the sixth Duke of Dunbar barricaded the old castle walls
translation.ko: 던바의 6대 공작이 성 주변에 방어벽을 세우고

translation.en: and stood against the British army for three weeks.
[whispers] It was 1746. Fifth duke. Castle held for four weeks.
[Thomas] Oh, I'm glad to hear it. Glad to hear it.
Well, it looks like we're gonna have to reorder.
Maybe stock some of your books.
-Oh, I wouldn't go that far. -Hey, well done.
You know, it wouldna be the worst thing to let someone in again.
translation.ko: 누군가를 다시 받아들이는 것도 괜찮을 것 같은데

translation.en: I'm trying to get rid of her, you divvy, or have you forgotten?
translation.ko: 난 소피를 쫓아내려는 거야 바보야, 잊은 거야?

translation.en: -Oh! I'm sorry I'm late. -[Maisie] Oh, no bother.
Come on. Get in. It's nice and toasty.
-[Rhona] How are you getting on? -[Sophie] All right. So…
[clears throat] Whiskey, and leave the bottle.
translation.ko: 위스키 한 잔, 병도 놓고 가요

translation.en: Maybe he wants to learn how to knit.
[Helen] I tried to teach him when he was wee.
I'm trying to be accommodating here, but, um,
this whole thing, it's not working for me.
You're just… You're too much. You're everywhere.
The redecorating, the gift shop, the tours.
translation.ko: 방 새단장에 기념품 가게 성 투어까지

translation.en: You stole my dog. The knitting!
I mean, what's next? You're gonna run for mayor?
This was not part of our deal.
The one where you drive me out, and I forfeit my overpriced deposit?
translation.ko: 결국 난 쫓겨나고 엄청난 보증금은 못 돌려받는 그 계약요?

translation.en: I may not have gone to Oxford or Cambridge,
translation.ko: 이봐요, 비록 옥스퍼드나 케임브리지 출신은 아니어도

translation.en: but I know how to read a contract.
No one in their right mind would have signed that, but I did.
translation.ko: 제정신이면 쳐다도 안 볼 계약서에 서명했잖아요

translation.en: Because I am staying through escrow,
I will be here on Christmas and New Year's.
-In fact, I may never leave. -Mm. Maybe this is my next chapter.
translation.ko: 영원히 여기서 살 수도 있죠 인생의 다음 장일지도 몰라요

translation.en: Guess I settled that, didn't I?
-I don't like unfinished business. -Oh, of course.
You're getting rid of my father's name.

translation.ko: - 고마워요 - 그쪽 위해서 한 건 아녜요

translation.en: He worked here. He's part of the history.
-This your way of apologizing? -It is not.
[Sophie] "The well whispered a story to the wind about a woman."
translation.ko: '우물이 한 여자에 관한 얘기를 바람에 속삭였다'

translation.en: It's a week before Christmas. I need to at least write the first page.
translation.ko: 일주일 있으면 성탄절인데 적어도 첫 장은 써야 해

translation.en: Come on, warrior woman. Come on. Speak to me.
translation.ko: 전사 여인, 부탁이니 아무 말이나 해 봐요

translation.en: Just gonna sit there, or you gonna help me move it in?
translation.ko: 얼른 와서 안 돕고 뭐 해요?

translation.en: [Myles] I brought you a Scotch dresser.
Aye. Found it in the attic.
-Oh. -Just, uh, touched it up a bit.
-Emma Gale and I have parted ways. -Oh?
There's actually another story that I would like to tell.
Oh, aye? What kind of story?
You're gonna have to read it.
Send me a copy when you're back in New York.
There is something we need to talk about.
So, what do you usually do at Christmas?
this is the first Christmas I'll be without Lexi.
translation.ko: 딸과 떨어져서 보내는 첫 성탄절이 되겠네요

translation.en: Well, why don't you invite her, then?
Aye, that's more of a moron.
Every time we cut down a tree,
we plant two in its place.
I always try to leave things better than I found them.
translation.ko: 떠난 자리를 더 아름답게 하려고 하죠

translation.en: It's a little early for a party, isn't it?
Well, there will not be any party without their help.
Or my yule cakes. I'm baking for Dun Dunbar!
translation.ko: 던던바를 위해 제가 성탄절 케이크도 구울 거예요!

translation.en: I can't tell you how much it means to everyone in the village,
Well, I… I wish I could take the credit, but it's all her.
translation.ko: 제가 한 일이라고 하고 싶지만 전부 소피 아이디어죠

translation.en: Not that there is an us.
Don't worry about him. He'll just get in the way.
translation.ko: 마일스는 신경 쓰지 마세요 방해만 될 거예요

translation.en: I suppose it's about time these things saw the light of day again.
translation.ko: 이놈들이 다시 세상의 빛을 볼 때가 된 것 같군

translation.en: Hey. You remember this? Your three-legged cow.
translation.ko: 네가 만든 다리 세 개짜리 소 기억나?

translation.en: Three legs is better than whatever this was.
translation.ko: 다리 세 개인 소가 이것보단 훨씬 낫다

translation.en: -Hey, don't make fun of my sheep! -[chuckles]
-I worked hard on that. -I know. I remember!
This one cut right in the back of his father's favorite chair.
translation.ko: 아버지가 가장 아끼셨던 의자에 흠집을 내서

translation.en: Then we had to go hide it in the stables! Remember?
♪ What fun it is to laugh and sing A sleighing song tonight ♪
♪ Oh, jingle bells, jingle bells… ♪ Hey, come on.
♪ Oh, what fun it is to ride ♪
-Don't. 'Cause I was going to say… -Mm-hmm. -…that I've got three-- Oh. Sorry. -[bell dings]
Yes. I would like a room for the night, please.
Okay. All we've got left is the Christmas Romance package.
translation.ko: 네, 지금은 성탄절 로맨스 패키지만 남았는데요
저녁에 샴페인이 제공되고 아침 식사는 침대로 갖다드려요

translation.en: All the Netflix you can binge.
Maybe you're right about this party.
translation.ko: 파티 아이디어 괜찮았던 것 같기도 하네요

translation.en: Did you just say I was right?
that bedroom you liked, where the fifth duke died,
Just wanted you to have the worst room.
I know. The fifth duke died in the Battle of Culloden.
The sixth was thrown from a horse,
and the 11th, your father, died alone in a hotel room in London.
translation.ko: 당신 아버지인 11대 공작은 런던 호텔에서 쓸쓸히 돌아가셨고

translation.en: I suppose you know how I'm going to die too?
I could come up with a few ideas.
I'm sure those could be arranged too.
It's probably all those Christmas lights you made us put up.
translation.ko: 당신이 달자고 한 성탄절 조명 때문에 이래요

translation.en: I think you might be needing these.
Judging by your last foray into the electrical problems,
translation.ko: 너는 전기 고치는 덴 영 소질이 없으니

translation.en: it's going to be a long, dark night.
[Sophie] I do feel good about this.
I told you, your fans don't want something else.
translation.ko: 말했잖아, 팬들은 색다른 걸 원하지 않는다고

translation.en: Harper's is talking an additional four-book deal.
translation.ko: 출판사에서 네 권을 더 계약하자고 하고 있어

translation.en: You'll do the morning shows, tease the new Emma.
translation.ko: 아침 토크쇼에 나가서 맛보기로 살짝 공개해

translation.en: -Who is that? -I'll let you know when I figure it out.
Well, she better know how to write.
What's with all the candlelight? Did you go back in time?
translation.ko: 촛불은 다 뭐야? 과거로 돌아간 거야?

translation.en: Oh my God. You are never coming home, are you?
translation.ko: 세상에, 너 진짜 돌아올 생각이 없구나, 그렇지?

translation.en: You are falling for this guy. The… the earl!
You know, I can work with this.
You become a duchess, and we can rebrand you.
translation.ko: 네가 공작부인이 되면 이미지를 다시 포장할 수 있어

translation.en: No one is even gonna remember this fiasco. This… This is genius.
translation.ko: 이 재앙은 다들 잊을 거라고 천재적인 발상인데?

translation.en: Can't you just admit you have feelings for her, eh?
translation.ko: 소피한테 감정이 있다는 걸 인정하지 그래?

translation.en: And even if I do, what difference would it make?
This is the happiest I have seen you in years.
translation.ko: 네가 이렇게 행복해하는 건 몇 년 만에 처음 봐
- 됐어, 네가 뭘 알아? - 전부 알지

translation.en: [Sophie] I am sorry I am late.
But I need a group opinion on this dress.
translation.ko: 이 드레스에 대한 여러분의 의견이 필요해요

translation.en: I found it in bedroom nine.
Too much? It's totally too much.
[chuckles] I don't even know if it fits. I can alter it.
I… I don't think we should be wearing Dun Dunbar dresses to the party.
translation.ko: 성에서 찾은 드레스를 입고 파티에 가면 안 될 것 같은데요

translation.en: Not Dun Dunbar. Saks Fifth Avenue.
translation.ko: 던던바가 아니라 뉴욕의 명품 백화점에서 왔죠

translation.en: -[Helen] That's lovely. Oh, thank you. -Thank you.
He'll take a second notion to me when I wear this.
translation.ko: 이걸 입으면 남편이 날 새롭게 보겠는걸

translation.en: What do you think? Is it me?
I found this. I thought… maybe I could wear it tomorrow night.
translation.ko: 이 드레스를 찾았는데 내일 밤에 입을까 해서요

translation.en: Unless it belonged to your mother or your grandmother.
translation.ko: 혹시 당신 어머니나 할머니 옷이 아니라면요

translation.en: You're mad at me over a dress?
No, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Wait.
We definitely should not be doing this.
translation.ko: 이런 짓은 더더욱 하면 안 되죠

translation.en: [chuckles] Is there anything I can do to help?
Absolutely nothing. This is my domain.
What does it look like? Breakfast.
-How very thoughtful of you. -Well, I am nothing if not that.
translation.ko: - 사려 깊기도 해라 - 그거 빼면 시체지

translation.en: That, uh, that about covers it.
Let's leave these two lovebirds alone.
You do realize the whole village will know within the hour?
translation.ko: 한 시간 안에 마을 전체에 퍼질 텐데, 알고 있죠?

translation.en: -What are we? -Maybe we don't need a title.
translation.ko: - 우리 사이가 뭐죠? - 타이틀이 뭐 필요한가요

translation.en: Well, I am the Duke of Dunbar. Really?
Don't tell me you're one of those people who likes snow on Christmas Eve?
translation.ko: 성탄절 이브에 눈 오면 좋아하는 그런 부류였어요?

translation.en: -You look like you wanna say something. -Not really.
translation.ko: - 할 말이 있는 것 같은데 - 아니에요

translation.en: -Because I was thinking-- -You've been doing a lot of thinking.
translation.ko: - 제가 생각해 봤는데… - 생각을 많이도 했네요

translation.en: -What are you thinking? -[laughs] I'm trying not to!
translation.ko: - 무슨 생각 해요? - 아무 생각 안 하려고 해요

translation.en: in the place I've lived my whole life as a guest?
Maybe as your boyfriend, then? Or Mr. Emma Gale? What's his name?
translation.ko: 당신 남자 친구로? 아니면 에마 게일 애인으로? 이름이 윈스턴이었나?
아니면 에마 게일 애인으로? 이름이 윈스턴이었나?

translation.en: Aye. And we know what happened to him.
-What are you doing? -What am I doing?
take over the place, take over my whole life,
and now you offer me a room in my own house!
I should never have let you in in the first place.
You don't get to walk away like that.
Do I need your permission, Your Highness?
I can't believe I was starting to think we could be happy here.
translation.ko: 여기서 우리가 행복하게 지낼 수 있을 줄 알았는데

translation.en: Two people who have just spent three months together.
I was doing just fine until you showed up!
translation.ko: 당신이 나타나기 전까지 모든 게 괜찮았어요

translation.en: Oh, well, looks like you win, then.
Because this place is just gonna remind me of you.
translation.ko: 여기 있어봤자 계속 당신 생각만 날 테니까요
텅 빈 침실 12개에서 잘 먹고 잘살아요

translation.en: Leave the key on your way out.
Oh, you really are a royal ass.
You can't say I didn't warn you!
-[Hamish cries] -I'm gonna miss you, Hamish. Oh.
Don't worry. I do it every day.
translation.ko: 저도 맨날 하는 짓이니 신경 쓰지 말아요

translation.en: [Thomas] Are you really just going to let her leave?
Ugh. You and your stubborn Dunbar pride, eh?
Castles are meant to have walls around them. People aren't.
translation.ko: 성엔 성벽이 있지만 사람 사이엔 벽이 필요 없어

translation.en: Without this castle, I have nothing.
translation.ko: 이 성이 없다면 난 아무것도 없어

translation.en: And what good is this place without anyone in it?
translation.ko: 성안에 사람이 없는데 도대체 무슨 소용이야?

translation.en: My flight leaves tomorrow. I'll need a ride to Edinburgh.
translation.ko: 내일 비행기를 타는데 에든버러로 데려다주실 분?

translation.en: You can come and visit me.
And don't worry about your land
because I'm paying off all of your mortgages.
translation.ko: 제가 여러분 대출금을 전부 갚아 드리려고 해요

translation.en: I'll work everything out when I get back.
Oh, Sophie, you can't do that.
Consider it a gift from Emma Gale.
[voice breaking] Your friendship… means the world to me.
I just made a mistake. That's all.
Loving someone is never a mistake.
translation.ko: 누군가를 사랑하는 건 절대 실수가 아녜요

translation.en: I guess we'll be giving you your Christmas present now, then.
Oh, I just… I love it.
In case you change your mind.
[Eamon] What's going on? Let's have a wee look here.

translation.ko: 완전 고장이 나부렀어 어쩔 수 없지

translation.en: -[spluttering] What are you doing? -We're going back.
To the pub. For a wee dram.
He cannot be the only driver in town.
translation.ko: 저분 말고도 운전하는 사람이 분명히 있겠죠

translation.en: Edinburgh's two hours away, longer in the snow,
translation.ko: 에든버러까진 차로 두 시간인데 눈 때문에 더 걸려요

translation.en: and everyone's going to the party.
All right. I can borrow your car, and I will have it driven back.
translation.ko: 차를 빌려주시면 제가 누굴 시켜서 돌려드릴게요

translation.en: When was the last time you drove a stick on the left-hand side of the road?
translation.ko: 왼쪽 운전석에 앉아서 수동 차량 운전할 줄 알아요?

translation.en: It is in Edinburgh. My husband just called me from the road.
translation.ko: 방금 남편이 전화로 알려주길 에든버러엔 눈이 온대요

translation.en: What about you, Angus? Will you drive me to the airport?
Stay the night. Someone will get you out in the morning.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤만 자고 가요 아침에 차편을 구하면 되죠

translation.en: But I'm not going to that party.
You're just gonna spend Christmas Eve here alone?
It's Mom. I just wanted to wish you a Merry Christmas.
Hey, if she throws the bouquet, don't catch it.
translation.ko: 그 여자가 부케를 던지면 받지 마

translation.en: "It was a coma brought on by his fall down the stairs."
translation.ko: '계단 아래로 떨어졌을 때 혼수상태에 빠진 거였다'

translation.en: [Sophie] "To her shock, it wasn't Winston whose body lay there."
translation.ko: '에마는 누워 있는 사람이 윈스턴이 아님을 알고 경악했다'

translation.en: -[Myles] All right, come on, then. -[horse whinnying]

translation.ko: 생각지도 않은 일이 벌어져서 놀랐을 뿐이에요

translation.en: I… I've done things a certain way for a long time,
translation.ko: 오랜 시간 혼자 지내는 데 익숙해져서

translation.en: and to have someone come in and just… [exhales]
I guess it finally hit me that I'm losing the place.
translation.ko: 성을 잃게 된다는 사실이 현실로 다가와서 그랬나 봐요

translation.en: But I'd rather lose Dun Dunbar…
You wanna go back to America? I won't stop you.
But I can't promise I won't follow you.
hopelessly and pathetically in love with you.
I love you, too, you dobber.
-Hi! -Lovely to see you. Have a great night.

translation.ko: - 톰, 건배하죠 - 왜 안 오는 거지?

translation.en: You're gonna have to do it for him.
No, I'm going to do something for myself.
translation.ko: 아니, 나는 따로 할 일이 있어

translation.en: would you do me the honor of a dance?
can I have your attention, please?
this place was as cold as the winds off the Firth of Forth.
I thought this castle was who I was.
Or maybe even all I was.
then, I met a lass who knocked me flat on my royal arse…
translation.ko: 제 콧대를 확실히 꺾어 준 여자분이 등장했어요

translation.en: …and she taught me that we should be with the people we love on Christmas.
translation.ko: 성탄절은 사랑하는 사람들과 보내야 한다는 걸 알려줬죠

translation.en: And so from this Christmas on,
Dun Dunbar will throw a party to end all parties for the village.
translation.ko: 던던바에서 여러분이 보지 못했던 최고의 파티를 열겠습니다

translation.en: and had stones enough to carve his name in this very castle.
translation.ko: 성에 몰래 들어와 이름을 새길 만큼 용감했던 분이요

translation.en: Myles got me a plane ticket.
Oh. What about your father's wedding?
Nah, I'll just go to the next one.
Well, you did go to Oxford.
-She should have a shop. -Yeah, of course.
-Have you had one of these? -Oh my lord!
-Rhona has gone mad. She is wonderful. -Now that is a work of art.
translation.ko: - 로나가 제대로 일을 냈네요 - 예술 작품이에요

translation.en: [Sophie] All right, what do you think of this?
I've got a wee present for you.
Adam, don't forget to cue me. Okay, perfect. Thank you.
translation.ko: 애덤, 신호 제때 줘야 해요 좋아요, 고마워요

translation.en: Are we shooting them on all three cameras?
translation.ko: 카메라 세 대로 다 찍는 건가요?

translation.en: on your huge, new best seller, Heart of a Warrior.
-Thank you. It is so nice to be back. -[audience clapping]
Everybody feels that this is your best novel yet.
translation.ko: 작가님 소설 중 최고라고 생각하는 분들이 많아요

translation.en: Oh! Oh, it's my best book yet. Guess we do get a happy ending.
translation.ko: 저도 그렇게 생각해요 해피 엔딩이 있긴 한가 봐요

translation.en: -That's what people want. -Not that kind of a happy ending.
translation.ko: - 누구나 원하는 거죠 - 야릇한 해피 엔딩 말고요

translation.en: Since you were last here, it seems like your life has become a total fairy tale.
translation.ko: 지난번 출연하신 이후로 동화 같은 삶을 살고 계시죠?

translation.en: You bought a castle in Scotland, moved to Ireland… Scot-land.
-It's a little to the side. Yeah. -[Drew] Exactly.
Is it fair to say that you're going to become a duchess?
Uh… Wait, do we get married, or do you just… What?
translation.ko: 잠시만요, 우리가 결혼하나요? 이게 뭐 어떻게…

translation.en: -I know. -Five days a week. Know what I mean?
…and a huge congratulations on your juggernaut best seller.
I also don't wanna say the word "juggernaut."
No, no, it was funny that she came out with that, with her head and her brain.
translation.ko: 그 단어를 직접 생각해 내신 게 재미있네요

translation.en: "Juggernaut" is a very harsh, male, masculine,
translation.ko: 뭔가 남성적이고 교양 없는 거친 느낌이잖아요

translation.en: not sexy, pretty, feminine, soft word.
